item.title: Streaming 101 - Part 1
item.description: Jump In! The best way I’ve found to learn things in technology is by immersion, so we’ll start with a short intro and then this first part 1 will be focused on saving money with streaming through an old school style HD antenna. In part 2 we’ll dive into Internet streaming services and options. Why do you want to stream anyway? The past few years has seen a surge in people cutting the cord.
